meanings.definition: A type of organic compound containing a nitrogen atom bonded to one or more alkyl or aryl groups.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the amines in the laboratory.
meanings.sent2: Amines are commonly found in many household products.
meanings.sent3: The amines in the solution seemed to dance under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: Her perfume was a bouquet of floral amines.
meanings.sent5: The smell of amines lingered in the air long after the experiment.

meanings.definition: A class of compounds derived from ammonia by replacing one or more hydrogen atoms with organic groups.
meanings.sent1: The amines used in the reaction were carefully measured.
meanings.sent2: Chemists often work with amines in their experiments.
meanings.sent3: The amines in the test tube whispered secrets to the chemist.
meanings.sent4: The classroom was filled with the vibrant colors of amines.
meanings.sent5: The amines bubbled and fizzed in the beaker, creating a mesmerizing display.
